adviseScripts.text: Winter is such a beautiful season.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: At nighttime, the Christmas lights sparkle,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: and every store has a Christmas tree in their front display.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I'm thinking of putting one in the Commander's Room.
It's the most beautiful season of the year.
*Gasp*
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Really? If you do, can I come see it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I promise to keep quiet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Absolutely!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Other seasons are...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Actually... I don't know much about other seasons.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about the specialties of winter with Anne.
Rupee was telling me there's a dessert on Royal Road that's only sold during the winter.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: The line is apparently really long though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Let's go together and wait in line.
I can go and get some for you if you like.
You'd be willing to do that with me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: As long as I'm with you, the line won't seem so long since time passes so quickly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: But... then you'd have to wait by yourself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I don't want that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Anne and I talk more about seasonal desserts.
Teacher, have you ever used frosting when making cookies?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Emma said it can be fun, but that you need to have decent drawing skills as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: How the cookies taste is what's important, not how they look.
If you're good at drawing, that's great, but it's not mandatory.
Emma is always so creative with her cooking. And it's always super tasty.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I guess there's no reason to be nervous. Thanks, Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: ... I don't get it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Do I need to be good at drawing or don't I?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I look up more information on cookie frosting with Anne.
It feels to me that the Ark is filled with people who like video games.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Exia is always carrying around her GameKid,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: and Maiden does cosplay... although I'm not entirely sure what that's all about.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Nothing wrong with video games, but those two take it to the extreme.
It's good to have hobbies.
You think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Even so, they both look so happy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I'd like to have a hobby like that one day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: That's what I think, too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I always enjoy visiting downtown with you, Teacher. Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I recommend a game for beginners to Anne.
Teacher! I just found out the coolest thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: There's a place on the surface where the snow is piled up as high as your head!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: In those kinds of places, you have to watch out for avalanches.
The next time I go to the Northern Base, do you want to come along?
An ava-what?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I don't know what that is, but it sounds dangerous.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: In that case, I'll steer clear of those areas.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I'd love to!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: This is my first time hearing about this place. It sounds like there's an incredible amount of snow there though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: You think there will be enough there to make a snowman?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about the northern base with Anne.
Teacher...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Do you have a family?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: To be honest, I can't remember.
You all are my family.
I'm sorry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure they were nice people, just like you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Sorry for asking, I'll be more careful next time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: We... we are?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: There's nothing in my notebook that mentions that...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Is that why Rupee always calls you Sweetie?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about families with Anne.
Rupee is so pretty.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Maybe that's why she has as many friends as she does.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Do you think I'll have that many friends one day?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Everyone is uniquely charming in their own way.
You can achieve anything you put your mind to.
Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I'm not sure exactly where my charms lie,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: but if you say so, then I'll believe you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Wow...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I really hope so.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Then one day I'll have my own group of friends!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Anne and I discuss what kind of person we want to be in the future.
Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I've decided. I'm going to be a mail carrier.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: How'd you come to this decision?
Is it just because you want to ride a motorcycle?
Every time I see Sugar riding her motorcycle, I want to take it for a spin.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: But I think she may not let me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Do you know how to become a mail carrier anyway?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Yeah!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Every time I see Sugar riding her motorcycle, I want to take it for a spin.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Then let's ask her for a ride.
Do you think she'd be okay with that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: After our session, I decide to take Anne over to see Sugar.
Teacher, I have a bit of a weird question.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Is it really true that if you hang a sock on the wall during the holidays, it'll be stuffed with gifts the next morning?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: That's right. Just let me know if you decide to hang one.
It's true, but only for children who have been nice.
Okay,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: be sure to put in a good word for me with the fairy!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Wow, is there anyone you don't know?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Oh... then I might not get anything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Something tells me that won't be the case.
If you think so, then I'll try it out tonight!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I start to think about what to put inside the sock.
Teacher, have you ever had a snowball fight?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Neon says that if you scrunch up some snow and throw it, it makes a big explosion.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Snow isn't explosive.
It only did that because Neon tampered with it.
True... the snow that fell in the Ark felt a lot like cotton candy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I think Neon was just messing with me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Wow! That's incredible!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Could you use a snowball to take down a Rapture?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Anne and I discuss the finer points of snowball fight techniques.
Emma and I are going to bake a cake today. What shape should I make it into?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: You decide for me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: A snowman.
Why don't you just buy a cake instead?
Oooh, that'll look great!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I've gotta hurry and tell Emma.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Huh? Why would I do that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I've never made a cake before, so I was really looking forward to trying it out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about cake with Anne.
Lalala♬
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Do you often sing Christmas carols?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: When it's going to be Christmas, sure.
Singing really isn't my cup of tea.
What's your favorite?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I love the ones that mention Santa.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: That's too bad...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I was really excited to sing some Christmas songs with you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I spend time with Anne singing Christmas songs.
Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I've had a lot of people tell me that marshmallows and some kind of hot drink are the ultimate combo.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: What was the drink called again...?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Hot chocolate?
Coffee?
Yes, that was it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I've never tried it before. I wonder how it tastes?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: No, it wasn't coffee.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Isn't coffee supposed to be bitter?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Rupee says I'm too young to drink coffee, but that I'll probably drink lots of it when I'm older.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Anne and I talk more about drinks that warm you up.
If there was one person you could write a letter to wish them season's greetings,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: who would it be?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: You, of course.
Santa Claus.
To me? Then I'll write back to you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Can we start now?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: What would you tell him?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: As for me, I'd write a letter to you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I spend time writing letters with Anne.
Even though nothing out of the ordinary happened today,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I feel so content.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: If you're happy, then I'm happy.
Those are the best days.
Well, I'm happy that you're happy that I'm happy, haha!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Wow, it's kinda like a happiness spiral.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: ... Teacher, did something bad happen?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: You look a little down.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about feelings with Anne.
I got invited to a party today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Should I bring a gift or something like that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I don't know anything since it's my first time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: You don't have to do that.
Bring a snack or some kind of party favor.
Is it really okay to come empty-handed?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I feel like I should bring something...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: That's a great idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: What kind of snack should I bring?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about parties with Anne.
Everyone's been talking a lot about Christmas miracles lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Do you believe in miracles?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Yes. I believe in miracles.
No. There's no such thing as miracles.
Me too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I feel like a miracle is going to happen soon, don't you? I don't know what it'll be though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: How come?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Personally, I believe that miracles do exist.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about miracles with Anne.
Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Merry Christmas!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Merry Christmas, Anne.
Today isn't Christmas...
Apparently everyone greets each other like this during the holidays.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: It feels nice, especially coming from you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Whoops.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I thought you could say it as a normal greeting, like "Hello."
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I guess I had it wrong...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about Christmas greetings with Anne.
Teacher, have you ever been on a sleigh before?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Apparently you can only ride them in the snow.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Would you like to ride one now?
I can't say I have.
Can we really? Then let's go!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Oh, I thought you had...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: In that case, let's go for a sleigh ride together!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about sleighs with Anne.
If you only had one wish,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: what would you wish for?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: For you to be happy.
Nothing. I'm perfectly happy right now.
You'd use your only wish on me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... then I'd wish for you to be happy too!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Then I'll make a wish for you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I'd wish for you to stay happy forever.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: Oh, and Rupee too! Oh, and Emma, and... agh, too many!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anne

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about wishes with Anne.
